thread.section_title: The Z Hotel Piccadilly - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (London, England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Tiny, clean rooms - a bit noisy
thread.title_full: Tiny, clean rooms - a bit noisy - Review of The Z Hotel Piccadilly, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: SusaMasa
title: Tiny, clean rooms - a bit noisy
text: The hotel location is about as central you can get, still it's on a quiet street. The rooms are tiny, but they have everything you need - a bed, tv, internet connection and shower with toilet. For one person the room is excellent - but for two the double room feels crowded. There is some noise from inside the hotel - mainly the water pipes "singing", so if you are a light sleeper I recommend brining ear plugs. The staff at the reception are very friendly and helpful. And the room price includes a glass of wine and cheese every evening from 5 to 7 (or 8). If you don't tend to spend a lot of time in your room, the Z-hotel is a good option for a short city break - 1 or 2 nights.
